body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Austin Lopez and the customer's name is Ruth Rodriguez.  The conversation is about Happy Animal Shelter (a Animal Shelter ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling ABC Services. My name is John. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi John, I have a question about my recent order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'd be happy to help with that. Can I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Sarah Lee.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. To better assist you, could you please provide your order number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Absolutely. The order number is one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. And can you also confirm the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No problem. The last four digits are seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. I have all the information I need to look into your order. Thank you for your patience.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No worries, thanks for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome. Thank you for calling ABC Services. Have a great day!
